item.title: Global Streamflow Characteristics Dataset
item.description: The Global Streamflow Characteristics Dataset (GSCD) consists of global maps of 17 streamflow characteristics, including baseflow index, runoff coefficient, and flow timing, providing information about catchment behavior for the entire land surface including ungauged regions. The maps are unique in the sense that they were derived using a data-driven (top down) approach based on streamflow observations from an unprecedentedly large dataset of approximately 7500 catchments around the globe, rather than using a physically-based (bottom up) process model. The GSCD can be used for a wide range of large-scale hydrological applications, such as water resource assessments, catchment classification, groundwater recharge estimation, stream ecosystem assessments, and diagnosis and parameterization of macro-scale hydrological models. See Beck et al. [2013] and Beck et al. [2014] for further details.

item.title: ESA CCI Surface Soil Moisture Combined Product
item.description: A global soil moisture product at 0.25degree resolution produced during the ESA CCI project.

item.title: TRMM-3B42 3-Hourly Rainfall Rate
item.description: Rainfall rate (high quality rainfall, IR rainfall) and relative error

item.title: TAMSAT Rainfall Estimate Dekadal
item.description: Dekadal rainfall estimate from TAMSAT Research Group, Meteorology Department, University of Reading, UK

item.title: TAMSAT Rainfall Estimate Monthly
item.description: Monthly rainfall estimate from TAMSAT Research Group, Meteorology Department, University of Reading, UK

item.title: GSMaP Hourly Rainfall Rate
item.description: Dataset from the GSMaP_MVK hourly rain rate v5.222.1

item.title: MOD16 Evapotranspiration
item.description: Actual and potential evapotranspiration data from the satellite MOD16 dataset, which were corrected for New Zealand ground-observed data. Both data contain uncertainty estimates as well.

item.title: ESA CCI Soil Moisture
item.description: ESA CCI Soil Moisture data, which is the baseline product against which all improvements will be made, is available in thredds in non-aggregated and aggregated format.

item.title: ECMWF Forcing v0
item.description: The ECMWF Forcing data is available in thredds in non-aggregated and aggregated format

item.title: GRDC River Discharge
item.description: GRDC River discharge data for 22 stations is available on thredds. This dataset is not redistributable and so should not be used outside the eartH2Observe project; for this reason the data is available on the restricted access thredds instance so you will need the username/password to gain access to the data. You can find the login details on the project wiki at https://publicwiki.deltares.nl/display/INFORMED/Data+Access+and+THREDDS
